snippet.title: Sonic and the Secret Rings - Opening (HD)
snippet.description:
The land of mystery meets the Legend of the Speed

A.K.A Sonic Wild Fire & Sonic and the Secret of the Rings in E3 2006
This is the First Sonic game on Nintendo Wii

The first chapter in the Sonic Storybooks Series: The World of Arabian Nights

Sonic races through the exotic world of the Arabian Nights to harness the awesome power
of the Secret Rings before they fall into the hands of the evil genie, Erazor! 
The Blue dude is unastoppable whit the new ability to slow time and boost forwad faster than ever
but he's never gone up aginst a genie before!

Join whit Sonic to defeat the Evil Genie and save the world of Arabian Nights

''One of the year's most promising Wii titles'' - Nintendo Power
''Rethinks the gameplay of classic SEGA genesis sonic whit a Wii-mote twist'' - EGM
